entries.text: Watching and Playing Sports including: Tennis, Swimming, and of course FOOTBALL.
I also enjoy hanging out at the Michigan Football Stadium. Sometimes in the Locker Rooms. Sometimes in Lockers.
Improving my French. Because I currently have the vocabulary of a 10 year old.
Web, Graphic and Logo Design; I find the intersection between advertising, design, and technology really cool
Cooking, Baking, Eating, and taking pictures of food!

additional.category: I often host Male Beauty Pageants

entries.text: Yessir (or M'am) -- For the past 3 years, I have helped organize, direct and host the Mr. Engineer Competition.
My camera follows me where ever I go -- it's just a basic point and shoot camera, but it gets the job done.
I'm that kid who takes pictures of her food and posts it on instagram. I'm also a ninja photographer. You have been warned
